channel.title: [tut]How to become so rich you can afford to buy the whole of england
channel.description: [size=12pt]right first of all go to your local gun shop.."you know were u brought that ak47 from" now when your in the get out your phone an phone 4 frends and tell them to meet you at the gun shop in 20 mins.. now they have met you go to the counter an buy 4 silence pistols (not water guns) then shoot the man behinde the counter and rob asakly 400 ak47s and 200 uzies now your ready go to all the pubs in the arena and shout who wants some crack cocain? then the people who say me tell them you need them to do you a favour.. now say i will give you some crack cocaine if you get all your frends and go to the police station an kill all the pigs.. if they accept give them an there frends a ak47 each now go to ASDA and shout i will pay 1000pound to who ever dose a job for me now tell i will give you 1000pound if you get all your frends and go to every drug dealer in town and kill the, amd take there drugs if they accept give them the ak47s and now go back to your house and go on the internet and go to google and buy hmm 200 body guards now give them the uzies and the rest of the ak47s.. now your a druglord now carry when the people that are killing the pigs come to you and say mission compleated shoot them in the head an hart now when the people from ASDA come back and give you the drugs shoot them and now sell the drugs and buy 100 body guards and a realy big house now get a loan and buy 200 strech hummors and put all of your guys and you in the hummors and go the bank rob it and now you have no dept now go to your house and now higher 1000 pr*zzy and tell them work for me over wize i will shoot you and if i dont and u squeeile on me i will shoot your kids too.. now you have 1000 pr*zzys working for you go kill there pimps and now send your pr*zzys out to work now after 20 days take all there money an buy them a house btween 2 and now buy an extra 1000 body guards and tell them guard the pr*zzy houses 2 guards a house now you will get hmm 2000pounds a day from the pr*zzys... that shoud keep you going for 1 year il post back as soon as i have got my 200 strech hummors from the car dealers now if you become rich thank me if you dont blame tony blair.... now buy 2000 hit men and 2000 ak47s Noat: this will take 2 weeks to have enuf money to buy 2000 hit men an 2000 ak47s now go to the queens house and break down the gate and go on a rampage in her house now hold the queen hostage and say "right queeny you have 2 options iver sighn the throne over to me or i will kill you and your famly and the tramp who lives down the road if the says no kill her an fuage her signiture and now your the king or queen......[/size]

item.dc:creator: @xerlot xerlot
item.description:
@xerlot wrote:

lol i do and i forgot when u have the 1000 pr*zzys kill your 4 frends [br][size=1]Posted at: August 14, 2006, 11:04:48 AM[/size][hr]and when you have the thone sing this:
Lets gather around the campfire
And sing our campfire song
Our C-A-M-P-F-I-R-E S-O-N-G song
And if you don’t think that we can sing it faster then you’re wrong
But it’ll help if you just sing along

TONY BLAIR:
Pam Pam Pam…

YOURNAME:
C-A-M-P-F-I-R-E S-O-N-G
C-A-M-P-F-I-R-E S-O-N-G
